Band-Aid.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a piece of thin material that is stuck to the skin to cover cuts and other small wounds
Band-Aid.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a Band-Aid solution to a problem is temporary and will not solve the problem â€“ used to show disapproval
Band-Aid.translation[0].definitions[1].e: This idea is criticized by some as a Band-Aid solution.
Band-Aid.translation[1].definitions[0].d: an organization set up by Bob Geldof in 1984 to collect money for people dying of hunger in Ethiopia. This was done by getting many famous popular musicians to make a record together called Do They Know It's Christmas?, and by organizing the  Live Aid concerts in London and Philadelphia.
